Lotto Powerball $50 million jackpot: Locations of lucky punters revealed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-50-million-jackpot-its-time-to-check-tickets-for-looking-numbers/XVN3WYMBEFGJJIPS367RFSIXNQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-50-million-jackpot-its-time-to-check-tickets-for-looking-numbers/XVN3WYMBEFGJJIPS367RFSIXNQ/ The jackpot has been split between seven lucky players who each picked up $7 million. Sat, 08 Jun 2024 23:48:53 +0000 The prize was won by seven tickets as no single ticket had the correct Powerball and First Division Lotto numbers needed to win outright.
Child sex offender Lima Aleni, who spent 25 years as fugitive, loses Auckland High Court appeal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/child-sex-offender-lima-aleni-who-spent-25-years-as-fugitive-loses-auckland-high-court-appeal/74R62GITS5BEZMFI7ZZ3UCILDE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/child-sex-offender-lima-aleni-who-spent-25-years-as-fugitive-loses-auckland-high-court-appeal/74R62GITS5BEZMFI7ZZ3UCILDE/ Craig KapitanLima Aleni's behaviour during his decades at large helped bolster the prosecution's case. Sun, 09 Jun 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Lima Aleni, who was accused of child rape, was taken into custody at Auckland Airport after years of evading New Zealand authorities. Photo / Alex Burton

Two ‘zombie’ snapper caught in Auckland suggests disease more widespread https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/two-zombie-snapper-caught-in-auckland-suggests-disease-more-widespread/YLJWCWSGKFES5PAMF6UEWKOLOE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/two-zombie-snapper-caught-in-auckland-suggests-disease-more-widespread/YLJWCWSGKFES5PAMF6UEWKOLOE/ Denise PiperThe sick snapper caught near Port Albert suggest the problem is widespread. Sun, 09 Jun 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Steph Treadwell caught nine snapper near Port Albert on Saturday. Two of them were clearly sick and she says "zombie fish" is an appropriate term for how they looked, with sunken faces and eyes.
